description: Strategies of Reinventing China's Public Sector for Good  Governance

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description:
This project aims to support the State Commission Office for Pubic Sector Reform (SCOPSR) in developing and piloting comprehensive strategies for public sector reform. It will focus on five priority areas: 
1. People-centered government
2. Efficient and accountable governmental structures
3. Capacity building for good governance
4. Responsive local government
5. Operationalising public service unti reform
subproject.title: Public Admin Reform 07-11
